attributes.review: Got an virus from this app don’t download loves 😌💅🏻
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app made My stove to start playing a song I don’t know the name but I do know the lyrics here they are: have🤔you😒ever😔been😡snaked🐍by🙃a🤨 friend👧then😪just😾for 🤦the🗣️clout👀they'll😈do😣it😕again🙄.  It was very very loud and when I went to the local tanning place they ran out Bc of what u guys call president used all tanning materials even the ones u use at home 🤧 and when I compare the “president” to the oranges in my back yard all I got to say is that oranges looked like they had barely any color 👁👄👁.  So as I opened the app it asked me if it’s ok to allow mic 🎤 and I said no then I get a call from a man and he said:𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣. Anyways stream be happy! ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆.  All I got to say is BLACK LIVES MATTER!
attributes.title: BLM

attributes.review: Terrible app. I’d give it 0 stars if I could.
attributes.title: Worst App I’ve Ever Downloaded

attributes.review:
So like when I first got the app it made my phone yell 🧚‍♀️𝗖𝗵𝗶𝗰𝗸𝗲𝗻 DOODLE DOO🧚‍♀️so I smacked my phone like sit yo lil behind down but it ain’t listen to me🦋Then the app took me to Netflix and forced me to watch 365 Days🦄And then after that it kept making this weird thing pop up saying”ArE YoU lOsT BaByGorL🌚”I was gettin soo mad like stop mane then 5 days after my phone got off the bed and flew in the air and screamed weeeee😭But then like 10 days after that it got wayyy weirder My fridge walked to my moms room and screamed then the fridge forced me to vote but so I like cried my lungs out then it forced me again so I said Im✨u n d e r a g ᴇ✨
So I like cried Becuz then my phone got huge and I had to watch TikTok’s on a big screen it was kinda lit but it wasn’t cool then a glitch came along and said “ i make a mf 😎 say 🗣️ OH YEA 😼 im as cold 🥶 as a Lion 🦁 with no hair 👩‍🦲  if you ever see 👀 me fighting 👊🏽 in the forest 🌳 with a grizzly bear 🐻 HELP THE BEAR 😡 cause that b!th 🐶 gon need it🙏🏽” I WAS FRICKIN CONFUSED then I screamed help and a orange popped up beside me THIS APP IS A FREAKING ORANGE I HATE IT NEVER AGAIN😭
attributes.title: 💕read the paragraph it’s worth it💕

attributes.review: There’s over 800 facts left unchecked, our American values of freedom and justice for all is not even in there. They tell us it’s here to give us news but literally everything is the same theme as the last election.. where it’s discriminate this group, place blame on that group. I can not recommend this app, and to be frank I think having it in the App Store is a violation
attributes.title: Fake News

attributes.title: Do not get this app!!!!

attributes.review: if this app was a person it’s name would be abby🤢.as i opened the app i realized they need to MTAGA (make this app great again)!  it sends a false poor message about how are president is great and NO❤️, he’s not. the opening phrase “keep American great.” is a lie if you don’t agree please shut off fox news and do your own research☺️ thank you!
attributes.title: no❤️
